General.Name: Ping An Bank Co Ltd
General.Description: Ping An Bank Co., Ltd. provides commercial banking products and services for individual and corporate customers, government agencies, institutions, and other small businesses in China and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Wholesale Banking Business, Retail Banking Business, and Other Businesses. The company accepts deposits; grants short, medium, and long-term loans; and offers domestic and foreign settlement, and bill acceptance and discounting services. It also engages in the issuance of financial bonds; agency of issuing, redeeming, and underwriting government bonds; buying and selling of government and financial bonds; interbank lending; and bank card business. In addition, the company is involved in the provision letter of credit, guarantee, safe deposit box, offshore banking, assets custody, gold, financial consulting, credit investigation, witness, and other consulting services. Further, it offers cash management, debt, trust, securities, trade finance, investment banking, wealth management, insurance, and electronic banking services. Ping An Bank Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
